incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 07/07/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 07/07/2025 07:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 07/07/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 07/07/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.
